description.value:
Requirements In combat with a devil.

When fighting devils, you can fly into a celestial rage that lasts for up to 1 minute or until you Dismiss the effect. While in this state, your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-warlock.warlock-spells.Item.Nur1CbemWaor1hcv]{Eldritch Blast} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-warlock.warlock-spells.Item.moDOkmLX9b6Lk3ED]{Warlock's Hex} invocations deal spirit damage and gain the holy trait. You gain a +2 status bonus to all attacks targeting creatures with the devil trait. If you score a critical hit against a devil with any of your attacks (including spell attacks), you deal an additional @Damage[1d6[persistent,spirit]] damage.
